Rulings.Base: 1. Removing from play 2 "Nordic" monsters is a cost.\n2. Controlling no other cards is only a condition to activate the effect. You can still Special Summon even if you control another card when the effect resolves.\n3. You still Special Summon the Tokens even if Valkyrie is no longer face-up on the field when her effect resolves.
